name: Vikings JumpIn: Run and Jump
description:
This is a run and jump game. You play a Viking and have to try to complete the level before the time runs out. Carefully heavy.

There is 1 level to play. Difficulty level is difficult.

Control Smartphone: 

Joystick = Move, JumpButton = Jump (you can 3x Jump), Touch = Camera Move.

Compatible: Smartphone Android 5.1.
